pageProps.title: The Hidden Dangers of Diabetes: Understanding the Complications and How to Prevent Them
pageProps.metaDesc: Diabetes is a chronic medical condition that affects millions of people around the world. It is a metabolic disorder that arises due to the inability of the body to produce enough insulin or the resistance of cells to the effects of insulin. Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas that helps regulate the amount of glucose in the blood. In people with diabetes, their blood sugar levels remain consistently high, leading to various complications that can damage different parts of the body.
